data.name: Venineth
data.detailed_description:
Venineth is a single-player game focusing on unraveling the mysteries of ancient alien technology, somewhere in the universe via exploration, platforming, and puzzle-solving, in a dangerous, distant worlds.

Features

  • Over 20 places to explore, including: planets, moons, gas giants, orbital stations, asteroids, and alien megastructures
  • Semi-open world planetary levels with difficult to find tracks amongst a labyrinth of rocks, canyons, toxic lakes, and rivers of lava
  • Linear orbital levels, with challenging platforming sections containing gravity fields, force fields, and zero-g areas
  • Physics-based puzzles with varied mechanics
  • Original space-ambient music soundtrack

data.short_description: Venineth is a single-player game focusing on unraveling the mysteries of ancient alien technology, somewhere in the universe via exploration, platforming, and puzzle-solving, in a dangerous, distant worlds.
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Arabic, Bulgarian, Traditional Chinese, Simplified Chinese, Czech, Danish, Finnish, Greek, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Japanese, Korean, Norwegian, Polish, Portuguese, Portuguese - Brazil, Russian, Romanian, Swedish, Thai, Turkish, Ukrainian, Vietnamese, Hungarian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7/8/10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2300 2.8 GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 550 Ti (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change before launch
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-bit OS required)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-4670K 3.40GHz (or AMD equivalent)
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 (or AMD equivalent)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • Additional Notes: Subject to change before launch
